sandra.libs.dm.formfilllib
Class VXMLParser

java.lang.Object
  sandra.libs.dm.formfilllib.VXMLParser

public class VXMLParser
extends java.lang.Object

Parser that processes the contents of a VXML file and creates a Form object with a collection of Field objects.

Version:
1.3, 08/18/13
Author:
Zoraida Callejas, Michael McTear

Method Detail

getAttributes

private static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes(org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParser parser)
Returns the attributes of the current tag (e.g. field name), or null if it has no attributes. The parser must be placed in the current tag before invoking this method Idea from: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/4827168/how-to-parse-the-value-in-the-attribute-in-xml-parsing (code changed)

parseVXML

public static Form parseVXML(java.lang.String vxmlContent)
                      throws org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException,
                             FormFillLibException
Parses the string corresponding to a VXML file into a Form and several Fields.

Throws:
java.lang.Exception - If there are errors during parsing, mainly because of ill-formed files that do not follow the previous indications
org.xmlpull.v1.XmlPullParserException
FormFillLibException
